itineraries.title: ANDALUSIAN JEWELS: SEVILLE, CORDOBA, GRANADA, RONDA AND MALAGA.
itineraries.notes: Du baroque sévillan aux jardins nasrides, un condensé d’art, d’histoire et de paysages vertigineux.

visits.text: Cathedral of Seville and Giralda — immense Gothic and former Almohad minaret.
Real Alcázar — Mudéjar palace with azulejos and refreshing gardens.
Santa Cruz Quarter — flowered streets and secret patios.

activities.text: Authentic flamenco show in a peña in the historic center.
Sunset cruise on the Guadalquivir to see Triana from the water.
Tapas crawl around Alfalfa and Alameda for a lively evening.

visits.text: Mosque-Cathedral (Mezquita) — forest of bicolored arches unique in the world.
Roman bridge and Bridge gate — panorama over the Guadalquivir.
Judería — courtyards, synagogues and white alleys.

activities.text: Olive oil tasting at a traditional mill near the city.
Bike ride along the river in the late afternoon.
Evening at Arab baths with hammam and mint tea.

visits.text: Alhambra — Nasrid palaces and Generalife, Andalusian masterpieces.
Mirador de San Nicolás — sunset view over the Alhambra.
Albaicín — sloping Moorish quarter with fragrant small squares.

activities.text: Mint tea and oriental pastries in a tetería on Calderería.
Introduction to Alpujarra weaving with a craftsman.
Night at the Arab baths with scented oil massage.

visits.text: Pont Neuf and Tajo gorges — canyon splitting the city in two.
Old town and Mondragón palace — gardens and courtyards.
Mirador de Ronda — viewpoints over the Serranía.

activities.text: Gentle hike on the Tajo trail at the foot of the cliffs.
Wine tasting of Serranía de Ronda wines at a small estate.
Photography class at sunset over the gorges.

visits.text: Alcazaba and Roman Theatre — layers of history facing the sea.
Picasso Museum — works by the local son.
Historic center — cathedral and bright calle Larios.

activities.text: Morning swim at Malagueta then chiringuito for espeto de sardines.
Bike ride to the port of Muelle Uno.
Rooftop at the end of the day with sea view.

itineraries.title: BARCELONA AND COSTA BRAVA: MODERNISM, COVES AND WHITE VILLAGES.
itineraries.notes: Des chefs‑d’œuvre de Gaudí aux calanques turquoise, une échappée méditerranéenne pleine de caractère.

visits.text: Sagrada Família — unfinished basilica, stone forest and flamboyant stained glass windows.
Gothic Quarter — cathedral, small squares and medieval alleys.
Passeig de Gràcia — modernist facades, Casa Batlló and Casa Milà.

activities.text: Creative tapas in the Eixample then walk to Barceloneta beach.
Ascent of Montjuïc by funicular and gardens at twilight.
Vermouth aperitif in a bar in Gràcia.

visits.text: Ramparts of Girona — panoramas and medieval towers.
Houses on the Onyar — colorful facades and photogenic bridges.
Jewish Quarter (El Call) — cobbled streets and history museum.

activities.text: Tasting of xuixos and artisanal coffees near the Rambla.
Guided tour of 'Game of Thrones' filming locations.
Tapas evening in the Barri Vell.

visits.text: Vila Vella — medieval ramparts overlooking the Mediterranean.
Gran Beach and Es Codolar cove — crystal-clear waters.
Lighthouse promenade — views of the Costa Brava.

activities.text: Supervised snorkeling in a protected cove.
Sea kayaking along cliffs and caves.
Grilled fish dinner at the port.

visits.text: Dalí Theatre-Museum — total immersion in the artist's imagination.
Sant Ferran Fortress — gigantic Enlightenment bastion.
City center — Catalan shops and pastry shops.

activities.text: Empordà wine tasting in an urban bodega.

visits.text: Port of Cadaqués — white houses and colorful boats.
Cap de Creus — windswept mineral landscapes.
Dalí's House in Portlligat — surrealist universe (reservation required).

activities.text: Hike to Cape Norfeu with views of the coves.
'Marine lights' photography workshop in late afternoon.
Fishermen's tapas bar facing the port.

itineraries.title: MADRID AND ROYAL CASTILE: PALACES, WALLS AND MASTERPIECES.
itineraries.notes: Capitale vibrante et joyaux classés à courte distance, parfaits en escapades d’un jour.

visits.text: Prado Museum — Velázquez, Goya and European schools.

Plaza Mayor and San Miguel — arcades and gourmet market.

activities.text: Tapas route in La Latina in the evening.
Sunset at the Temple of Debod.

visits.text: Roman aqueduct — 167 granite arches without mortar.
Alcazar of Segovia — fairy tale castle.

activities.text: Tasting of cochinillo asado in a historic asador.
Walk on the ramparts and viewpoints.

visits.text: Walls of Ávila — intact medieval enclosure.

activities.text: Complete tour of the ramparts at sunset.

visits.text: Primatial Cathedral — flamboyant altarpiece and treasures.

activities.text: Damascened steel workshop at a craftsman's.

visits.text: Royal Palace of Aranjuez — summer residence and rococo salons.

activities.text: Strawberry picnic in Aranjuez in season.

activities.text: Paella cooking class over wood fire.

activities.text: Short hike to the castle viewpoints.

visits.text: Santa Bárbara Castle — views over the bay.

itineraries.title: BAY OF BISCAY: BILBAO, SAN SEBASTIÁN AND FISHING VILLAGES.
